body_html: I'm trying to understand this patch and the correct behavior of fs init. It seems that if a process group is initialized using a particular file and isn't yet finished, anther process group should not initialize using the same file, right? If so, could we have some code to check this and properly throw an error? :)

body: I'm trying to understand this patch and the correct behavior of fs init. It seems that if a process group is initialized using a particular file and isn't yet finished, anther process group should not initialize using the same file, right? If so, could we have some code to check this and properly throw an error? :)
